block.p: HAMBERGER--Anita, 97, of White Plains, NY. Loving mother of Barnett Hamberger and Judith Lewis. Adored grandmother of Joshua, Elizabeth, and Samantha Lewis, and Jennifer Berkey, caring mother-in-law of Jeffrey Lewis and grandmother-in-law of Steve Berkey. She is also survived by an extended family of nieces and nephews. Funeral services Wednesday, 10am at Gutterman's, Inc., 175 Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre, NY.
